attributes.action: Reject the plan to quietly remove a person's citizenship without notice
attributes.background: Prevent the addition of clause 9 - "notice of decision to deprive a person of citizenship". After the horrific lessons of Windrush the government should not be legislating for a clause which so heavily discriminates against first and second generation immigrants and undermines our human rights.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/601583
